title: What would you do if someone ACTUALLY dreamed of people's deaths that haven't happened yet
body:
And this this on a near constant basis and was 95% accurate :/

Let's say they dream about things to happen the night before up to a month before it happens.

And let's say they experience them by dreaming 'living as that person' until that person dies.

And this person can accuirately identify in news articles what happened and who it happened to and where, most of the time at least if they see the information in the dream.
